de.cect.blockid.identitystorage.identitymanager.identityvalidator.logic.api.usecase

Interface UcDecryptIdentityAssertion

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IdentityValidator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdentityValidatorImpl, UcDecryptIdentityAssertionImpl

    public interface UcDecryptIdentityAssertion
    Use case for fetching a referenced identity assertion and decrypt it with a given key.
    Since:
    blockid-0.0.1
    Author:
    ctinnes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DecryptedIdentityAssertionTo decryptIdentityAssertion(IdAssertionMessageTo assertionMessage, java.lang.String keyBase64)
      Takes the givven assertion message and decrypts its attribute value by use of the given key and validate the signature.
      DecryptedIdentityAssertionTo decryptIdentityAssertion(java.lang.String attributeName, java.lang.String receiverAddressBase64, java.lang.String senderAddressBase64, java.lang.String keyBase64)
      Fetch identity assertion defined by name, receiver and sender and decrypts its attribute value by use of the given key and validate the signature.

    • Method Detail

      • decryptIdentityAssertion

        DecryptedIdentityAssertionTo decryptIdentityAssertion(java.lang.String attributeName,
                                                      java.lang.String receiverAddressBase64,
                                                      java.lang.String senderAddressBase64,
                                                      java.lang.String keyBase64)
        Fetch identity assertion defined by name, receiver and sender and decrypts its attribute value by use of the given key and validate the signature.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the identity attribute name
        receiverAddressBase64 - the receiver address
        senderAddressBase64 - the sender address
        keyBase64 - the key to decrypt the encrypted attribute value with.
        Returns:
        transport object for the decrypted identity assertion or null if something goes wrong or validation failed.

      • decryptIdentityAssertion

        DecryptedIdentityAssertionTo decryptIdentityAssertion(IdAssertionMessageTo assertionMessage,
                                                      java.lang.String keyBase64)
        Takes the givven assertion message and decrypts its attribute value by use of the given key and validate the signature.
        Parameters:
        assertionMessage - the identity assertion message
        keyBase64 - the key to decrypt the encrypted attribute value with.
        Returns:
        transport object for the decrypted identity assertion or null if something goes wrong or validation failed.
